reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, soft, and comfortable, appreciating that it gets softer with washing and isn't itchy. They like its style, with one customer noting it's versatile enough to dress up or down, and they find it perfect for winter in Texas. The length receives mixed feedback - while some find it ideal for pairing with leggings, others say it's too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality very flattering
items.body: I love these sweaters I have purchased 5 of them over the past 3 years. They are made of a soft knit that is very comfortable & flattering. They wash up well but I line dry to preserve the knit. Minimal piling after many many wears but easily fixed with a pile shaver. Read more
items.author: Heidi H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
items.body: Material is a little lighter that I expected. It will work for cool spring days as well. Looks good with casual or dressy outfits. Like the loose but not too loose fit. Length covers tummy and behind, so is a slimming look. Would buy again. Read more
items.author: Ena B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely yes.
items.body: This sweater is so nice, the quality, the softness, and the fit was perfect. Read more
items.author: Lindsey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and nice quality
items.body: I purchased this sweater in 2 different colors and will order more. It fits great and looks cute with leggings or jeans. I ordered a size medium which is my usual size and it fits perfect like a sweater should. I got the burgandy and the tea rose colors and both are pretty in person. I’m also happy with the quality and they seem to wash well. I got mine on sale, not sure I’d pay the full price. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great everyday sweater
items.body: Great sweater for the price. True to size and washed well. Medium weight for fall and spring. Soft and cozy. Will order in another color soon. Read more
items.author: Lenise angerbauer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Waffle Sweater I have ever purchased!
items.body: I recently got the MEROKEETY Women's Long Sleeve Oversized Crew Neck Solid Color Knit Pullover Sweater, and I'm absolutely loving it! This sweater has quickly become a staple in my fall wardrobe. First off, it's incredibly cozy and warm, perfect for those chilly days. The oversized fit gives it a relaxed, comfy feel while still looking stylish. I can easily layer it over a tank top or wear it on its own, and it looks great either way. I bought it in a large and it was perfect! I am 5 ft 5 inches and weigh about 150 lbs for reference. The solid color design makes it versatile, allowing me to mix and match it with various outfits. The quality is fantastic, and it's held up well after a few washes, which is a big plus. Overall, I can't get enough of this sweater. It's stylish, comfortable, and perfect for the fall season. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a cozy and fashionable addition to their wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Ashley Curtsinger

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Yellowish
items.body: I love these sweaters and have them in several colors. I thought this one looked like it had a bit of a taupe undertone. Going for bone, but it looks closer to butter. There’s definitely a hint of yellow more than what it shows in the picture. More yellow than “cream”. Otherwise, I like it, but the color was a disappointment Read more
items.author: HappyInTheValley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: I love this sweater so much - I have purchased 5 of them in different colors! I currently wear between a Medium and a Large - purchased a medium in this, but the colors each fit a bit different so if you are between sizes you may need to experiment. Some of the mediums fit like mediums and some fit closer to large. All of them look amazing, long enough to wear with leggings, and so very comfortable. Have had many compliments while wearing them. Best Amazon clothing purchase ever! I live in Texas and can wear this on a typical winter day that starts in the 40s and ends in the upper 70s, so I would say it is thick but not crazy warm. Great in the South, but may be a bit light in a Northern winter setting. Read more
items.author: Honey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rust, Burgundy, Black, Etherea, Mocha, Dustyblue, Dustypink, Tealrose, Navy, Khaki, White, Tealgreen, Beige, Tea Rose. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
